metadata.title: CVE-2024-1062 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap overflow flaw was found in 389-ds-base. This issue leads to a denialof service when writing a value larger than 256 chars in log_entry_attr.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
